caption:
“Even in chaos, I am with you.” — Isaiah 41:10

Reflection:
Amid thunder and confusion, presence remains. God stands steady where all else shakes.

Commentary:
This verse promises companionship in turmoil. Faith is not the absence of storms, but assurance within them.
